The dimensions of this rectangular prism are as follows: * Length: 0.5769 * Width: 0.75 * Height: 0.75 **Part 2: Instructions for the next part** Following the same instructions for part\\_1, proceed with the detailed step-by-step instructions to build the remaining parts of the CAD model. Ensure that you provide all natural instructions without any additional assumptions, including the height, width, and length of each intermediate part and the final shape. Remember to use clear headings and section breaks to organize each part's instructions with `<part_num>` tags to distinguish between parts.</description>
